abstract: Carlos Tevez was fined a month's pay by Manchester City for refusing to enter a game in September, but rather than accept it he is vowing to sue for defamation of character.
snippet: Carlos Tevez was fined a month's pay by Manchester City for refusing to enter a game in September, but rather than accept it he is vowing to sue for defamation of character.

headline.main: Tévez Situation Takes Another Odd Turn
